DOC.brief_summary: This investigation multi-center study demonstrate GE Monitor meet equivalency and/or accuracy and/or performance criterion . This investigation compare test device ( ) , one reference parameter , combination parameter , include NIBP , temperature , SpO2 , respiration , ECG .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Of The GE Monitor Product Line
DOC.criteria: Signed informed consent subject and/or guardian Ability maintain proper placement cuff and/or probe and/or sensor Presence atrial fibrillation irregular heart rhythm ( applicable ) Ability single dual monitor NIBP , ECG , and/or SpO2 , whether already monitor parameter ( SuperSTAT development study ) Any subject deem unstable , clinician 's discretion , another reason deem unacceptable study clinician Known dysrhythmias ( applicable ) Known disease state medical condition A ) compromise circulation extremity , B ) compromise musculoskeletal integrity , C ) otherwise contraindicate use NIBP cuff and/or SpO2 sensor extremity ECG patch skin Vigorous exercise prior participate study Excessive movement excitability cause false value determination Known allergy latex latex product contact subject Subjects eaten , drank , smoke chew gum precede half hour ( temperature parameter ) Nasal/septal defect , cold and/or allergy would allow subject breathe nose ( temperature parameter ) Subjects flammable anesthetic use . Adult/pediatric subject , ( great 1 year age ) , clinician 's discretion , could tolerate approximately 12 , 25 blood pressure extremity Pediatric/neonatal subject , ( less 1 year age ) , clinician 's discretion , could tolerate approximately 10 , 12 blood pressure extremity Presence pacemaker make atrial fibrillation rhythm indistinguishable Subject 's limb circumference outside manufacturer 's recommend cuff range Subject Korotkoff sound persist nearly zero ( applicable )
